description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.

description.short: Enhances Damage and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Damage and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.

description.short: Reduces Endurance Cost and Pet +AoE Resist(All), +Regeneration
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Grants you a 40' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's damage resistance by 10%, boosts regeneration moderately and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
